title: The most user friendly music app.
info_bullets: Get all of your phone music in one place.
Scroll and pick the song you wish to play.
Have all of your music sorted by song or artist name.
Easily Control the music even when using other apps
info:
This is an on-constructing free app.
Its main goal is to bring a very simple music application for everyone use.
 If you would like to report an issue, plese feel free to contact me:
